Name: Dr. Ford Prefect
Address: Betelgeuse System, Sector ZZ9 Plural Z Alpha
Notes: Always knows where his towel is. Expert in interstellar travel medicine.

Name: Dr. Zaphod Beeblebrox
Notes: Former President of the Galaxy. Specializes in multiple personality disorders.

Name: Dr. Marvin Android
Notes: Brain the size of a planet. Treats existential depression and cosmic angst.

Name: Dr. Slartibartfast
Notes: Award-winning fjord designer. Specializes in geological health issues.
